ringinfo Class Reference

#include <alm_map_tools.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 ringinfo (double theta_, double phi0_, double weight_, int nph_, int ofs_)

Detailed Description

A class holding information about a ring of pixels in a spherical map.

Definition at line 41 of file alm_map_tools.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ringinfo::ringinfo (  double  theta_,
double  phi0_,
double  weight_,
int  nph_,
int  ofs_
)  [inline]
 

Constructs a ringinfo object.

Parameters:
theta_ colatitude of the ring (in radian)
phi0_ longitude of the first pixel in the ring (in radian)
weight_ weighting factor for all pixels in the ring. This is typically the surface of a pixel in sterad.
Note:
weight_ is only needed for map analysis, not synthesis.
Parameters:
nph_ number of pixels in the ring
ofs_ index of the first ring pixel in the total map array (counting from zero)
